mapper.select: select * from theater where theater_region = #{theater_region} group by theater_region
select theater_region from theater group by theater_region

select s.*, m.movie_nm, m.poster_url, r.room_name from screen s join movie m on s.movie_id = m.movie_id join theater t on s.theater_id = t.theater_id join rooms r on r.room_id = s.room_id where t.theater_name = #{theater_name} order by s.screen_start_time
